Package: grails.gorm

[Java] Class PagedResultList

        • grails.gorm.PagedResultList

        • A result list implementation that provides an additional property called 'totalCount' to obtain the total number of records. Useful for pagination.

          Authors:
          Graeme Rocher
          Since:
          1.0
